title: Add Daily progress bar in Study Planner (match Weekly)

requirements.summary: Add a Daily-view progress bar in StudyPlannerPage positioned under the "Your Daily Study Tasks" heading, matching the existing Weekly progress bar styling and calculating percent from Daily tasks only.
acceptanceCriteria: When the Daily tab is selected, a progress bar is visible directly under the "Your Daily Study Tasks" heading and above the daily task list.
Daily progress percent is computed as (completed daily tasks / total daily tasks) Ã— 100 (0% when there are 0 daily tasks).
The Daily progress bar styling (colors, size, typography, spacing) matches the existing Weekly progress bar exactly.
Daily progress only reflects Daily tasks; Weekly progress only reflects Weekly tasks; switching tabs updates each independently.
No existing buttons move position; task card sizes remain unchanged; no spacing/layout shifts occur outside the added Daily progress bar element.
The Weekly progress bar remains unchanged in appearance and behavior.

file_operations.description: In the Task List CardHeader section, insert a new progress bar block that renders only when currentView === 'daily', placing it immediately after the CardTitle ("Your Daily Study Tasks") and before the task list content. Duplicate the existing Weekly progress bar JSX/CSS classes exactly (including any percent label/typography) to ensure identical styling, using the same computed percent logic for the currently filtered daily tasks (0% when total is 0). Use the shadcn-ui Progress component already imported from '@/components/ui/progress' to render the bar. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Ensure no other UI/layout changes: do not move the existing header buttons (sort/clear/export), do not alter spacing elsewhere, do not change the Weekly progress bar block, and do not touch the summary card.
